March 2, 2012 Ron's Cozy Corner By Milwaukee Journal Sentinal There is the Wisconsinite's essential devotion to fish fry. And then there is the smelt-fry subculture. People who... Full review November 2, 2011 Dogg Haus By On Milwaukee On Milwaukee - 2011 Best Hot Dogs/Sausages Full review November 2, 2011 Kopp's Frozen Custard Stand (Brookfield) By On Milwaukee On Milwaukee - 2011 Best Frozen Treat Full review
Blogger reviews
Fast Food
June 4, 2012 Major Goolsby's By Road Tips Go to the corner of West 4th and Kilbourn and get a burger. But don't pass up the chance to look at an extensive collection of sports memorabilia. Full review October 21, 2009 Oakland Gyros By Road Tips The portions are huge - one gyro was a full meal in itself; and it was cheap - with a bottle of water, the total cost of the meal was under $6 bucks. Full review
Diner reviews
Fast Food
July 4, 2012 Sobelman's Eastside Grill Never go back by lisagcc12 ( 1 review ) You place your order at the counter and pay there, then you sit down and they give you your food. Ok.. I had the worst experience I have ever had. The man working was so angry and depressed it was very unpleasant. The service ruined my experience. I will never go back. The staff should maybe smile..a little bit. June 29, 2012 Oscar's Pub&Grill Mobile review by FLueNT ( 1 review ) O Burger or nothing! June 16, 2012 Five Guys Burgers and Fries (Pewaukee) Great Burger Place by Tim Denehy ( 62 reviews ) WOW!! what a great burger place. Great ingrediants, huge portions. Clean 50's style ambiance, great music piped in! Super casual, super fast with friendly staff. You wont be disapointed
